pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 20, 2017:

Barrie, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Barrie, Jeff Lehman.

City Hall
70 Collier Street
Barrie, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media must arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit with families at Centennial Park and highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Centennial Park
Barrie, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity and open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.

Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Dock 2017 (un) Conference.

Closed to media.
